name: Bobsters inc.
description:
Although it appears to be a simple Jump'n'Run adventure, turns out, it comes with a twist. How it works: the only way to stop moving is to jump or collide - but watch out, danger ahead! A level-based, single player Platformer, to reach the goal, choose the right path and overcome obstacles, such as lasers, with the aid of scattered crates and buttons.

There are no advertisements whatsoever, additionally, all content is free, so no In-App Purchases for you. Besides, the entire game operates offline. Other features include: an exchangeable skin, a button to unlock all levels at once and best of all: no installation required, so if necessary, just delete the file and the game is gone.

Additional notes: partial controller support, touch input fully implemented, though not recommended.
